projects.title: Bug Tracker
projects.description: An app used for creating tickets and managing projects and users working on those projects.

projects.title: Cms
projects.description: A content management system for creating journaling websites.

projects.title: Smart Brain
projects.description: A project with its main functionality is to detect people's faces and display a border around them

projects.title: Test
projects.description: This is a project meant for testing purposes

tickets.title: Have a link to create tickets from the project page
tickets.content: This should also set the project Id to already be set from the project it was just previously on. For an example when creating a ticket from the project with name "A" it should set that ticket's project Id to "A" in the create form by default.

tickets.title: Display warning when due date is passed current date
tickets.content: This can possible display a warning when the current date is near the due date as well

tickets.title: Allow to order by columns in ticket filter
Highlight the nav link that page is currently on
tickets.content: Have the nav link in the side nav to be highlighted depending on the page its on. Remix has a component for this called NavLink which could be useful for this. Try to get the dropdowns to be highlighted depending on the current page too.

tickets.title: Add pagination to ticket filter
Migrate completed ticket status to be closed
tickets.content: Instead of the completed ticket status, have a boolean of isClosed for tickets

tickets.title: By default do not show completed tickets in ticket filter
Improve security for sign in
tickets.content: Should have a session or something similar on signing in so this can be checked and will prevent being able to sign through the url params.

tickets.title: Allow to set tickets as completed from ticket filter
Implement archived projects page
tickets.content: Projects should have a property for isArchived and projects that have this set to true will be displayed in the archived projects page instead of the all projects page

tickets.title: Improve heights for default cards
tickets.content: Some heights don't match with others in the same row which makes it look weird. Cards in the same row should have the same height

tickets.title: Remove userId param from workspace url
tickets.content: This isn't needed anymore since sessions can be used for getting the user id with session id

tickets.title: Display popup when creating/updating data
tickets.content: This can be like a popup that is displayed somewhere at the top of the screen to let the user know that the data has been successfully updated

tickets.title: Fix ticket counts disappear on priority filter
tickets.content: For some reason the numbers on the priority filter buttons disappear when filtering by any priority

tickets.title: Have ticket filter options stored as search params in url
Display tag for closed tickets and allow to display closed tickets in ticket filter
tickets.content: In ticket filter display a tag next to the title to show that it is closed

tickets.title: Fix signout
tickets.content: Signing out from the workspace top nav bar should bring user to the login page AND destroy the session

tickets.title: Add closedDate property for tickets
tickets.content: When tickets are closed, this will set the closedDate

tickets.title: Display charts with stats in project details page
tickets.content:
Have some charts that display:
- A donut chart to display amount of total open tickets and tickets for each priority level and possibly another for status of tickets
- Another donut chart for displaying total open tickets but instead for ticket statuses instead of priority
- A line chart to display the amount of tickets closed each day throughout the last 7 or 14 days

action.data:
Have some charts that display:
- A donut chart to display amount of total open tickets and tickets for each priority level and possibly another for status of tickets
- Another donut chart for displaying total open tickets but instead for ticket statuses instead of priority

tickets.title: Allow to close tickets in ticket page
Fix error when opening create ticket page when no projects are available.
tickets.content: When opening the create ticket page when there are no projects, it would throw an error of getting undefined when accessing id.

tickets.title: Display a footer in the workspace layout
Improve label names in dashboard bar chart
tickets.content: In the dashboard the bar chart labels are in camel case which should be changed to be more readable

tickets.title: Display icons to default cards
Display visual indicator for empty lists
tickets.content:
When there is nothing from a list, it can show something that would tell the user nothing was found so it won't just look like an empty page. Places that would need to show this:
- Project list (All Projects)
- Ticket list (All Tickets)

tickets.title: Make it so closed tickets can't be checked in ticket filter
Fix tickets not updating state when closing them from ticket filter
Add eslint options to improve code
tickets.content:
Add options so:
- semi colons for every line possible
- leading commas in object fields

tickets.title: Display charts and other stats in dashboard
tickets.content:
Charts to have:
- A pie chart for all open tickets by priority
- A pie chart for all open tickets by ticket status
- A bar graph to display users to open tickets ratio per project
Other data to include:
- A list of all users
- A card to display total of open tickets
- A card to display open tickets near due date
- A card to display total of open tickets not assigned to any users

action.data: Display charts and other stats in dashboard

tickets.title: Change icons for side nav links
tickets.content: All the icons in the side nav bar are the same when that same icon should only be used for the Dashboard while the rest of the dropdown texts should have their own icon

tickets.title: Make pages responsive
Display visual indicators for async loading
tickets.content: On form submits, or other areas that load async should show a visual indicator/disable buttons when necessary

tickets.title: Implement role functionality for users
tickets.content:
Roles should remove/add features to users depending on the current role they have like for an example, a developer shouldn't be able to create users but an admin should be able to create users.

Also make sure for these pages that it should redirect user to dashboard or display an error message when they shouldn't be able to access this page:
- Create user
- Member roles
- Create Project
- Archived Projects
- Project page (if user is not assigned to the project)

action.data:
Roles should remove/add features to users depending on the current role they have like for an example, a developer shouldn't be able to create users but an admin should be able to create users.

Also make sure for these pages that it should redirect user to dashboard or display an error message when they shouldn't be able to access this page:
- Create user
- Member roles
- Create Project
- Archived Projects
- Project page (if user is not assigned to the project)

history.previousValue: Roles should remove/add features to users depending on the current role they have like for an example, a developer shouldn't be able to create users but an admin should be able to create users.
